categories: Category:Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic Omnibus

nodes.text: Star Wars Omnibus: Knights of the Old Republic Volume 1

Omnibus: Knights of the Old Republic Volume 1 is an Star Wars Omnibus-series trade paperback collecting the first three trade paperbacks of the Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic comic book series. It was published on August 21, 2013.

Padawan Zayne Carrick is suddenly a fugitive framed for the murder of his fellow Jedi-in-training. Little does the galaxy know, Zayne's own Masters are behind the massacre and dead set on recovering him before he can reveal the truth. Collects Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic issues #0-#18 (volumes 1-3).
